resources.string: This is the main activty, which is displayed to the user when the app is opened. In this screen, suggestions for new playlists, based on user\'s preference, are displayed. Each button (suggestion1, 2, and 3) takes the user to one of the playlists. It also has a sidebar that lists all of activities, such as account and payment, that users can access. At the bottom of the page, there is a button-bar to play a song. To make the button-bar to work, a media player will have to be implemented.
The playlist buttons are used to go back to the previous song, skip to the next song, or play the current song on the playlist.
